name: PEGS Europe: Protein and Antibody Engineering Summit 2023
content: Network with 1,500+ colleagues at PEGS Europe, the largest protein & antibody engineering event in Europe, which has been described as "the best biologics technology meeting in Europe". New this year is an entire conference stream devoted to machine learning, plus expanded coverage of bispecific antibodies. The 2023 event will feature: 1500+ attendees, 250 speakers, 20 keynote presentations, 60 talks from top biopharma, and 150+ scientific posters.
